meanings.definition: The outer curved ridge of the ear.
meanings.sent1: The anthelixes help direct sound waves into the ear canal.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched her anthelixes while adjusting her glasses.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf painted colorful stripes on the anthelixes of the statue.
meanings.sent4: The anthelixes of the landscape seemed to whisper secrets in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast a shadow that highlighted the anthelixes of her ear.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined both anthelixes carefully.
meanings.sent2: The artist sketched the intricate details of the anthelixes.
meanings.sent3: The anthelixes on the sculpture looked like tiny hills in a miniature world.
meanings.sent4: In the dim light, the anthelixes appeared as delicate as seashells.
meanings.sent5: The anthelixes of the twins were remarkably similar in shape and size.
